snippet: Investigators are recommending that Medicare officials take immediate action to reduce unnecessary prescriptions to older Americans with dementia.
abstract: Government Accountability Office will release report detailing evidence of widespread overuse of psychiatric drugs by older Americans diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease; report urges Medicare officials to immediately take action to reduce unnecessary prescriptions of antipsychotic medications.
lead_paragraph: Investigators are recommending that Medicare officials take immediate action to reduce unnecessary prescriptions to older Americans with dementia.

headline.main: Psychiatric Drug Overuse Is Cited by Federal Study
headline.print_headline: Psychiatric Drug Overuse Is Cited by Federal Study
